title: GG: Over $2 million raised for charity

replies.body: Well done everyone and hats off to riot for doing this in the first place. A massive company with heart. Never lose that riot. It's what sets you apart from the majority and why so many have stuck with you guys all these years. The events, the game, the champions and everything else has heart and people can see it. This a perfect example.
WP Riot, and GG to all those that contributed. Solid game, lads.
damn, i knew it was gonna be alot raised but this is crazy{{champion:222}}
I'm glad everyone chose the right charity

I don't think there is a right or wrong charity, all of them deserve the donations just as much as the other. It's like saying you should only donate to a cancer foundation as that's the most important. Yes it's important but there are also other charities out there that need it just as much :3

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} I value peoples Mental health over learning to code and learning to make a game. Also I didn't mean the others were wrong I'm just saying it wouldn't have been right if Basic Needs didn't get the most of it if you know what I mean as they all got money but Basic Needs deserved the bigger sum more.
And with my first comment I probably should have said "I'm glad people voted for Basic Needs"
Karthus is there twice and you're missing Draven
When will project vayne come out
